item.title: Colin Farrell’s Netflix Movie ‘Ballad of a Small Player’ From Edward Berger Gets Fall Release, First Look
item.description: Fala Chen and Tilda Swinton also star in the feature that adapts Lawrence Osborne’s 2014 novel.
